Front-End&nsbp;Bootstrap Components

  • Introduction
  • Navigation
  • Forms
  • Tables
  • Cards
  • Media
  • Altering Users
  • References

  1. Introduction

    Bootstrap defines a set of webpage UI components, such as nagivation bar, buttons, and Jumbotron

  2. Navigation

    Navbar

    Example of navbar:

    Components in a navigation bar

    1. A logo // go to home page
    2. A list of items // one of the item is active
    3. A input form for searching
    4. A button for going to search

    Because of responsive design, the navbar should collapse.

    In this case, a button should appear to open the collapsed items.

    Coding

    nav class="navbar, color-control, responsive-control, [positioning control, in-line form]"
    div class="container"
        a class="navbar-brand" // logo
        button class="navbar-toggler" // responsive design toggler
        
        div class="collapse navbar-collapse" // may appear or disappear
            ul class="navbar-nav"
                li class="nav-item active" 
                    a class="nav-link" 
                li class="nav-item"
                    a class="nav-link"

    Breadcrumb

        ol class="col-12 breadcrumb"
        li class="breadcrumb-item active"
        li class="breadcrumb-item"

  3. Forms

    1. input
    2. textarea
    3. button
    4. select

    Inside a form, there can be mutliple input tags that show different types of inputs, such as checkbox, textarea, telephone and buttons.

    form
    .form-group .row
        label .col-xxx .col-form-label for
        div .col-xxx
            input .form-control type
            input-group ...

    一个form里有几个form groups, 一个form group一般是一两个不同的form元素组成的一个整体，例如一个label和一个input text在一起组成一个.form-group

    Responsive is achieved by the div .col-

    <form action="localhost" method="get">
    <div class="form-group row">
        <label for="firstname" class="col-md-2 col-form-label">First Name</label>
        <div class="col-md-10">
            <input type="text" class="form-control" id="firstname" name="firstname" placeholder="First Name">
        </div>
        </div>

    Left side and right side

    1. label: label has a "for" attribute, whose value is the id of the input that is indicated by the label.

    input

    1. type="text/tel/email": class="form-control" id="", name="" placeholder=""
    2. type="checkbox": class="form-check-input" id="", name="", value=""

    select

    like the dropdown

    <div class="col-md-3 offset-md-1">
    <select class="form-control">
        <option>Tel.</option>
        <option>Email</option>
    </select>
</div>
    1. type="text/tel/email": class="form-control" id="", name="" placeholder=""
    2. type="checkbox": class="form-check-input" id="", name="", value=""

    点击sumbit button将发送一个get (或者post) request到指定的url，具体看form里的内容

    www.example.com/destination?name1=value1&s;name2=value2

    Button

    In this case, button inside form. In other words, button's type="submit"

    <div class="offset-md-2 col-md-10">
    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">
        Send Feedback
    </button>
</div>

  4. Button

    Button group

    Call Skype Email 
    <div class="btn-group" role="group">
    <a role="button" class="btn btn-primary" href="tel:+16124436366"><i class="fa fa-phone"></i> Call</a>
    <a role="button" class="btn btn-info" href=""><i class="fa fa-skype"></i> Skype</a>
    <a role="button" class="btn btn-success" href="mailto:123@gmail.com"><i class="fa fa-envelope-o"></i> Email</a>
</div>

  5. Tables

    * Tables do not just mean to display tabular data but also layout web content

    Bootstrap table

    1. individual rows or cells can be colored using "active", "success", "info", "warning", and "danger"
    2. responsive: e.g. horizontally scroll if width less than 768px

  6. Cards

    Help to highlight contents

    A card has a [header] and body block

    <div class="card">
    <h3 class="card-header bg-primary text-white">Facts At a Glance
    <div class="card-block">

  7. Media

    Media object are layout in a row. One side is a media source [img, video], another side is the media body, which can be text or event has a nested media

    img-fluid for responsive images, which set the image max width to be 100% and height auto.

    img-thumbnial: a border around the image

    shape of elements: rounded-circle -top -bottom

  8. Alerting Users

    Badges (徽章）

    span class="badge badge-pill badge-danger" // badge specifies type, -pill specifies type, -danger specifies color

    div class="alert alert-warning alert-dismissible" // alert specifies type, -warning specifies pattern, alert-dismissible gives the ability to close

    div class="progress" div class="progress-bar progress-bar-striped bg-danger" style="width:80%"
